resources.string:
Set the ringtone for a particular feature, or mute it.

For example, to set the ringtone for a regex rule:

  { \"regex\": \"rule_desc\" }

Calls permitted by this rule will play the specified ringtone.
Perform an actual call to test the ringtone.
Customize the ringtone for a particular feature, calls permitted by that feature will play the specified ringtone.

Customize the ringtone for a regex rule, the specified ringtone will play when the call is allowed by this rule.

Use case:
  Set different ringtones for particular people, contact groups, or number ranges.

This feature will be applied to the regex rule that has the same description.

For example, if you want to apply this to the regex rule Work, type Work in this field.

Bind a workflow to a Quick Settings Tile. On an incoming call, the workflow will be executed if the tile is active.

This can be used to modify settings on the fly, changes will happen temporarily in memory and will not persist to the configuration.

For example:
Use a tile to enable/disable a regex rule, setup like:
- Quick Tile
- Find Rules
- Modify Rules

Remotely configure the app for seniors.

How it works:
This workflow automatically downloads and applies a backup file from a specified URL every day.
When you want to remote update something, simply upload a new backup file, it will be applied automatically.

Tip:
You can host the backup file on GitHub.
Tag name shouldn\'t start with {, no need to add the curly brace.

Download spam numbers from a snapshot of the %s and import them into local database.

The workflow runs daily, it downloads the full 90-day dataset on the first run, then performs only incremental updates on subsequent runs.

Note:
  The data set is typically updated each weekday by about noon Eastern time.

So it\'s scheduled at 18:00, as the dataset is expected to be available by then.
Missing required column %s. You can use header %s for the number column, or map an existing header to %s in \"Parse CSV\".
This API also supports reporting numbers, enable this to also generate the reporting workflow.
